name: Bird path
description:
Overcome obstacles in the form of trees and stones so as not to lose the life of the bird. All you need is to fly into the checkpoint in the form of circles. With each checkpoint, the game become faster and more difficult to hit the circles.
Make as many positive checkpoints as possible to get to the first places on the leaderboard.

Features:

  • No enemies, no combat, just peaceful flight;
  • Relax music;
